reason.tex:
%text There will be times when you will have an equation or expression that \underline\text{looks like - but isn't exactly like} something you know.
Perhaps it is time to make a substitution and \underline\text{change the form} of the equation.
\underline\text{There are no standard rules} about what substitution to make.
\underline\text{You will just have to use your intuition } %
